Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawrence/Ainslie
ShortDescription: Northbound  56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Lawrence, Lipps and into the Terminal : due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Ainslie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound  #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Lawrence, Lipps and into the Terminal : due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Ainslie.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
